greeting.message: Can you stop staring? Yes, those are my ears. I'm an elf.
greeting.opt2: I was just admiring your beauty; I didn't mean to offend.

apology.message: Oh, okay. I'm sorry. Even though I moved here years ago, some people still look at me strangely.
apology.opt1: Was there a specific reason you moved here?
apology.opt2: What's your opinion of the local villagers?

fatherIntro.message: I'm looking for my father. He is a captain and a treasure seeker who went missing five years ago. Since this is the most well-known fishing village in the area, I thought it would be the best place to gather information.
fatherIntro.opt3: Any clues as to what happened to him?

captainInfo.message: Captain Theron Tidecaller. He was quite famous for his discoveries and an uncanny ability to predict weather conditions.
captainInfo.opt2: You also mentioned he was a treasure seeker?

pirateInfo.message: No, not like that. For him, it was more about the thrill of adventure than plundering or murdering people.
pirateInfo.opt1: If I find any clues, I'll let you know.
pirateInfo.opt2: Well, I hope you can find him.

treasureInfo.message: Treasure seekers dedicate their lives to searching for ancient artifacts and valuable items. My father is in possession of some of the rarest jewelsâ€”though I have no idea where he keeps them.
treasureInfo.opt1: Do you need some kind of permit to become a treasure seeker?
treasureInfo.opt2: That must be a good way to earn a living. Your father was probably quite wealthy.

permitInfo.message: A permit? Ha! Of course not. All you have to do is travel to the most dangerous places and hope no one else got there first.
permitInfo.opt1: I see. I'm something of an adventurer myself.

richnessInfo.message: Is rich? I wish I could say that, but no. Money never stuck to him. He would always spend it on new gear, ship parts, or simply give it away.
richnessInfo.opt1: Surely he has something hidden away, right?

hiddenJewelsInfo.message: I don't know. We can ask him ourselves when I find him.

rumorSceptre.message: The last rumor I heard was that he was looking for Primula's Sceptre.

primulaInfo.message: Queen Primula. She ruled over an ancient civilization called Messatan, believed to be long gone. It's probably just another fairytale, though.
primulaInfo.opt1: Why do you think it's a fairytale?
primulaInfo.opt2: Interesting. It's not surprising your father would be interested.

fairytaleInfo.message: There is no known proof. It's all just tales and rumors spread from ear to ear.
fairytaleInfo.opt1: You never know; there are many mysteries in our world.

fatherPersonality.message: He is the best at what he does, but he can be terribly naive.
fatherPersonality.opt1: He seems like quite a man. Hopefully, you can find him.

villagersOpinion.message: Useless. All they do is hang out in that stinky tavern. The only decent person living here is Marvin.
villagersOpinion.opt2: They can't all be that bad.

marvinInfo.message: An adventurer, like my father. I heard he came back a few days ago. He is a very skilled warrior.

marvinLocation.message: He is probably training people at the local exploration guild.

villagersComment.message: Believe me, you'll have had quite enough of every last one of them after you've spent a significant amount of time here.
villagersComment.opt1: It seems to me you're just venting your frustrations.
